name: iterm-read
description: Reads output from the active iTerm terminal.
author: Shinkai

lines_of_output.description: Number of most recent terminal lines to fetch (1-1000). Default: 25

terminal_output.description: Raw text of last N lines from active terminal session, includes ANSI escape codes

success.description: True if terminal output was read successfully, false if no active session or read failed

message.description: Details about read operation result, includes error message if failed
